title: Buddhist art and architecture's regional context

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
